response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $800,000 by both myself and you. Considering its immense worth, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at this price point. This opportunity is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible value while also maximizing my return on investment. I kindly request your prompt consideration of this offer. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 800000}
